Name: Alejandra Galicio
Description:
Alejandra was found badly wounded in the vicinity of Cerri avenue 900 on 7th April. She died 4 days later.

She was a member of the AIDS and Civil Rights Action Centre (Centro de Acción en SIDA y Derechos Civiles – CASDC) and of the National Coordination in favour of the Rights to Sexual Diversity (Coordinación Nacional por los Derechos de la Diversidad Sexual – CONADISE).

As of the end of 2005, the perpetrators of her murder had not been identified, but tdor.info records that she was beaten by the police.

International Gay and Lesbian Human Rights Commission (IGLHRC), 2005 Summary of the cases on Latin America and the Caribbean, January 2006.
